column1: Little Goat Diner////We had a gift card to use and had a great time
column2: it was gift the migrant workers night off evening
column3: and you could hear the stress in the servers voice when explaining they were struggling with a small staff on
column4: we didn't mind. There was a few thing I would've tried if that hadn't been out of product
column5: but my chicken was good. There was a man that was screaming at people on the way in and out(which was not the establishments fault)and it was so busy we couldn't sit at the Small 6 seater bar
column6: this wasn't a bad thing for the restaurant
column7: but soured the eve a bit for us. All in all would recommend a night here.
